text: I v bol'shinstve taynykh razgovorov lyudey, besed i skrytykh mysley net dobra, potomu chto zlo vzrastayet v tayne. No yesli ikh taynyye besedy posvyashcheny dobrym delam: milostyne, primireniyu lyudey mezhdu soboy - togda eto yavlyayetsya dobrym delom. I kto yego sovershayet, chtoby poluchit' blagovoleniye Allakha i Yego milost', tomu Allakh - slava Yemu Vsevyshnemu! - dayot velikuyu nagradu v blizhayshey zhizni i v budushchey
